name: Dinosaur Museum
description:
【Relaxed and getting more fun】
Simple operation is easy for you to start.. You will enjoy every moment with more smooth and comfortable gameplay.

【Collecting illustrated books to unlock the mystery】
The collection concludes prehistoric creatures from the Triassic, Jurassicand Cretaceous periods.Three types of evolutionary display. In addition,hundreds of dinosaur skeletons are included. It is waiting for you to unlock more unknown skeletons of mysterious creatures.

【Operating management and developing creative】
Simulated business game is warm style. Use business knowledge to earn billions of gold and go to DIY to build a museum

【Healing the mind with cute pets hatching】
Use your love to hatch dinosaur eggs, cute dinosaurs can break out of their shells, and you can also get a lot of money.

【Fun gameplay, unlimited joy】
Equipped with archaeological knowledge contest, exciting auction conference. You can enjoy a variety of gameplay .There are more various styles of booth decoration. Therefore, come and create your own unique museum!
